snippet.title: P3D/P5D - Bundle Sizzle
snippet.description:
Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight launch on PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®Vita on December 4, 2018! Get more info and pre-order now at http://atlus.com/personadancing.

Both games are jam-packed with a total of 25 songs each, a combination of fan-favorite original tracks from Persona 3 and Persona 5 and all-new remixes. Our latest trailer features remixes of some of the most popular songs from their respective games, Want To Be Close (ATOLS Remix) and Last Surprise (Jazztronik Remix).
